[[File:Jon Foster - Radbug.jpg|thumb|200px|''Radbug'' by [[:Category:Images by Jon Foster|Jon Foster]]]]
'''Radbug''' was an [[Orcs|Orc]] under the command of [[Shagrat]] at the Tower of [[Cirith Ungol]].  During the [[Battle of Cirith Ungol]] Radbug had his eyes squeezed out by Shagrat, killing him.  It is believed that Radbug had refused to obey him.<ref>{{HM|Guide}}, p. 325, entry "Radbug"</ref> Shagrat threatened the Orc [[Snaga (orc of Mordor)|Snaga]] with a similar fate if he didn't follow his orders.<ref>{{RK|VI1}}</ref>
